title: Analyzing Bob Ross Paintings

title: Analyzing Bob Ross Paintings
text: dive , make sure installed BobRoss package. can install package GitHub follows:
code: # Install the devtools package if you haven't already install.packages("devtools")  # Install BobRoss package from GitHub devtools::install_github("ETC5523-2024/assignment-4-packages-and-shiny-apps-Raodityaaa/BobRoss")

text: installed, load BobRoss package using: Function Overview BobRoss package includes key function loadbob() launches Shiny app exploring Bob Ross’s paintings based colors used one. function opens Shiny app, users can interact various plots explore color information.

text: Shiny app loaded, can: Explore year-wise changes color using slider. View tooltips showing color frequency. Scroll list colors paintings. app provides user-friendly interface visualize Bob Ross’s painting patterns color choices.

title: Analyzing Bob Ross Paintings
text: BobRoss package also contains underlying dataset detailed information colors used painting. can access directly custom analysis desired: dataset contains columns : season: season painting. episode: episode number painting. painting_title: title painting. colors: names colors used painting. data can used additional exploration analysis outside Shiny app.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Welcome BobRoss R package! package provides data Bob Ross’s Joy Painting includes Shiny app analyze colors used famous paintings. Dive vibrant world Bob Ross explore used different colors across paintings.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: BobRoss package contains: - dataset captures color information Bob Ross’s paintings featured Joy Painting series. - Shiny app allows visualize interactively explore colors used paintings.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: install BobRoss package, can use following command install directly GitHub:
code: # Install devtools package if you don't have it install.packages("devtools")  # Install BobRoss package from GitHub devtools::install_github("ETC5523-2024/assignment-4-packages-and-shiny-apps-Raodityaaa/BobRoss")
